basics.name: Md. Akmol Masud
basics.summary: AI/ML Researcher specializing in Computer Vision and Federated Learning. M.Sc. Student in Information and Communication Technology at Jahangirnagar University with expertise in quantum machine learning, medical AI, and data-efficient deep learning.

work.summary: Designed robust analytics pipelines to convert raw data into actionable, executive-level recommendations. Led end-to-end market research projects, from survey design to delivery of strategic insights.
highlights: Designed robust analytics pipelines for executive-level recommendations
Led end-to-end market research projects from survey design to strategic insights

work.summary: Organized high-impact workshops and seminars with industry experts. Directed outreach campaigns, increasing visibility and growing membership by 40%.
highlights: Organized workshops and seminars with industry experts
Increased membership by 40% through strategic outreach campaigns

education.institution: Institute of Information Technology, Jahangirnagar University
education.area: M.Sc. in Information and Communication Technology

education.institution: Institute of Information Technology, Jahangirnagar University
education.area: B.Sc. in Information and Communication Technology

certifications.name: IBM Data Science Professional Certificate
certifications.summary: 12-course specialization covering Python (NumPy, Pandas), SQL, data cleaning, visualization, exploratory data analysis, and introductory supervised learning. Applied these skills through hands-on projects, strengthening foundations for data-driven research.

certifications.name: Reinforcement Learning Specialization
certifications.summary: 4-course advanced specialization in reinforcement learning: k-armed bandit problems, Markov Decision Processes, dynamic programming, temporal-difference methods, policy gradient approaches, and deep RL. Building strong theoretical grounding for applications in federated and distributed learning systems.

awards.title: Zelestra x AWS ML Ascend Challenge
awards.summary: Achieved Top 8% (84th out of 1,016 global teams) in a machine learning competition focused on solar energy forecasting.

awards.title: DL Enigma 1.0 â€“ SUST CSE Carnival
awards.awarder: Shahjalal University of Science and Technology
awards.summary: Ranked 63rd in a competitive computer vision challenge emphasizing deep learning model efficiency.

awards.title: CUET ETE ML Competition
awards.awarder: Chittagong University of Engineering and Technology
awards.summary: Secured 37th place out of 200+ teams in a deep learning and NLP-focused competition.

awards.title: Duke of Edinburgh Leadership Award
awards.summary: Earned the Bronze Standard for demonstrated leadership, perseverance, and teamwork.

references.name: Dr. Mohammad Abu Yousuf
references.reference: Vice-Chancellor, Gazipur Digital University; Professor, Institute of Information Technology, Jahangirnagar University

publications.name: Stabilizing Federated Learning under Extreme Heterogeneity with HeteRo-Select
publications.summary: A novel approach to stabilize federated learning under extreme data heterogeneity using the HeteRo-Select method.

publications.name: Enhanced Alzheimer's Brain Scan Dataset: Normal and Synthesized
publications.summary: A comprehensive dataset of normal and synthesized Alzheimer's brain scans for developing and testing diagnostic models.

publications.name: MosqVision-3K: A Balanced Multi-Source Dataset of 3,000 Annotated Images for Culex, Anopheles, and Aedes Mosquito Species Classification
publications.summary: A balanced dataset containing 3,000 annotated images of three major mosquito species for classification tasks.

publications.name: KACQ-DCNN: Uncertainty-Aware Interpretable Kolmogorov-Arnold Classical-Quantum Dual-Channel Neural Network for Heart Disease Detection
publications.summary: A hybrid classical-quantum neural network with uncertainty awareness and interpretability for heart disease detection.

publications.name: MosQNet-SA: Explainable convolutional-attention network for mosquito classification with application as a RESTful API for dengue and malaria risk mapping
publications.summary: An explainable CNN with an attention mechanism for mosquito classification, deployed as a RESTful API for disease risk mapping.

publications.name: Lorentz-Equivariant Quantum Graph Neural Network for High-Energy Physics
publications.summary: A quantum graph neural network that respects Lorentz symmetry, designed for high-energy physics applications.

publications.name: Multi-Layered Password-Based Steganography: A Novel Approach for Tiered Information Hiding
publications.summary: A new steganography technique using multiple password layers for enhanced security and tiered data hiding.

publications.name: Dream: A Novel Explainable Neural Network for Detecting Sleep Apnea Using Single-Lead ECG Signals
publications.summary: An explainable deep learning model named Dream for accurate sleep apnea detection from single-lead ECG signals.

publications.name: Quantum Rationale-Aware Graph Contrastive Learning for Jet Discrimination
publications.summary: A novel graph contrastive learning method with quantum computing principles for improved jet discrimination in particle physics.

publications.name: Pseudo-RGB Data Augmentation for Improved Alzheimer's Disease Detection: An Analysis of CNN Performance
publications.summary: An analysis of a pseudo-RGB data augmentation technique to enhance the performance of CNNs for Alzheimer's detection.

portfolio.name: Multilingual RAG System - Bangla Text Book Pipeline
portfolio.description: Built a complete Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system that understands both English and Bengali. Features dual embedding strategy (Cohere + OpenAI), advanced reranking, OCR processing for Bengali text, and a FastAPI backend with Streamlit GUI. Successfully deployed on AWS EC2 with Nginx reverse proxy. The system ingests HSC Bangla textbooks and provides intelligent question answering capabilities.

portfolio.name: Human Detection with YOLOv8
portfolio.description: Developed a full-stack web application for detecting humans in user-uploaded images. Features a YOLO object detection model backend (FastAPI), a Streamlit frontend, and is fully containerized with Docker for easy deployment on an AWS EC2 instance.

portfolio.name: Multi-Layered Password Steganography
portfolio.description: Developing a novel steganography technique using multiple password layers for enhanced security and tiered data protection, based on research for ECCE 2025.

portfolio.name: Privacy-Robustness Bound in Federated Learning
portfolio.description: This research proposes and empirically validates a Privacy-Robustness Bound (PRB), a theoretical framework for quantifying the trade-off between differential privacy and model robustness against poisoning attacks in federated learning.

portfolio.name: Monte Carlo Simulation for Bangladesh Election
portfolio.description: Developing statistical models using Monte Carlo methods to analyze electoral patterns and political spectrum distribution in Bangladesh.

portfolio.name: Ice Cream Brand Analysis
portfolio.description: An analysis project focused on the ice cream market, exploring brand popularity, consumer sentiment, and market trends using modern data analysis techniques.

portfolio.name: Clickshots Package
portfolio.description: Building a comprehensive Python package for automated screenshot capture and processing with advanced image manipulation capabilities.

extracurricular.description: First Place in 110m Hurdles and Second Place in High Jump
Active volunteer and participant in co-design workshop on early detection of dementia

extracurricular.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
extracurricular.description: Active member and leadership role in organizing technical workshops and seminars
